items.title: Southwest adds 1 new city in 4-route California expansion
items.description: Southwest Airlines has tapped a small airport serving California wine country as its newest destination.

items.title: Chase Ink Business Cash card review: Great for office supplies and technology services
items.description: Look to this versatile business credit card if your business has a healthy amount of office expenses and doesn't spend much on travel.

items.title: 7 US beaches for an unexpected fall vacation
items.description: Whether you want to go for sun-drenched swims or stroll along a quiet coastline all bundled up, here are 7 of the best U.S. beaches to visit this fall...

items.title: Swiss moves up US debut of posh new Airbus A350
items.description: Swiss will introduce the Airbus A350 with its swanky new "Swiss Senses" onboard product on flights to Boston in November.

items.title: The latest attraction in Vegas? Dynamic pricing at hotel lobby shops
items.description: At Las Vegas hotels, dynamic pricing at lobby shops means bottled water, beer, sunscreen and other items could cost you more depending on when you buy...
